column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=It was finally the day , I was going to donate all of my hair to make wigs for people with cancer .
#text=I had been growing my hair out for 2 years and today was the day my plan would come to fruition .
#text=I headed to the barber shop , my head filled with ideas on how I should get my hair styled .
#text=I finally settled on the idea of getting a high and tight , after so long having long hair ; short hair would be a great change of pace .
#text=I walked in the door of the barber shop and I waited until one of the barbers had a free chair .
#text=The man asked how I wanted my hair cut , I told him I would like a high and tight , but I needed him to cut off the long ponytail that I was going to donate .
#text=After all the formalities he got to work and styled my hair , we idly chatted the whole time he was cutting my hair .
#text=After he was finished I paid and took my hair with me .
#text=It would be mailed away for a good cause today .
